transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Haanji sir, namaskar. Main Anand Vajpayee baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke helpline mein aapne call kiya hai kya madad kar sakta hun sir?

Customer: Ji Anand ji, main Char Enterprises se baat kar raha hun. Actually pe maine abhi kuch ek mahine pehle IndiaMART ka subscription plan liya tha ye. Ji ji. Lead ke liye. To mujhe jo jo expectation thi lead ko lekar ke ya fir ye IndiaMART se business ko lekar ke wo

Customer: fulfill nahi ho pa rahi. Matlab yahan se mujhe koi lead, koi response nahi mil raha IndiaMART ke through. To mujhe ye cancel karwana hai apna package plan.

Executive: Thik hai. To sir ye jaise ki kya samasya aa rahi hai sir jaan sakta hun?

Customer: Ji main isme hota kya hai na ki maine jo IndiaMART ka subscription plan liya tha wo isi base par liya tha ki mujhe Udaipur local shahar se lead mile aur business yahan se mile. To yahan se bilkul bhi lead inquiries vagera kuch bhi nahi hai zero. Sirf ek mahine ke andar ek ek inquiry mujhe Udaipur ki mili hai wo bhi unfortunately customer ko need nahi thi uske liye product ki. Hmm hmm. Aur wo consume kar deta bhi nahi hai ki lead consumption ki vajah se.

Customer: To ye sab dikkat hai aur basic jo mera motive tha wo yahi tha ki mujhe Udaipur ki leads chahiye thi. To yahan ki zero leads se to I think iske sath continue karne se koi fayda nahi hai.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: To ye basically sir jaise ki abhi jaise aapki services ka jo hai kuch hi din hua hai sir istemal karte hue. To basically agar aap services sir continue karenge istemal karna, thik hai for a longer duration ke liye jaise for sir 15-20 din hua hai ya ek mahina hua hai aapki services ka. To aage bhi agar continue karte hain sir jaise 15 din 10 din aur istemal kariye sir. Kahin na kahin aapko iska utilization milega aur sari chizon ka benefit bhi milega sir. Koi bhi matlab company jab start hoti hai to one month ke andar andar sir thoda slow response rehta hai lekin fir dhire dhire speed up karta hai aur ek positive response milna shuru hota hai sir.

Customer: Bilkul bilkul aapki baat sahi hai lekin main jaise IndiaMART ka pehle bhi customer reh chuka hun Jaipur mein humne use kiya hai wahan par achcha response tha second aur third day se humne Jaipur mein leads mil gayi thi aur even mujhe yahan Udaipur mein baithe hue Jaipur ki leads, Indore ki leads aur Ahmedabad ki leads wo show ho rahi hai aur pehle To aapka aap kahan deal karte hain sir sabse jyada?

Customer: Udaipur, Udaipur local.

Customer: Sir abhi naya business hai to at least Udaipur ko sabse pehle capture karna hai. Uske baad bahar ki dekha jayega kyunki jab bhi chota business hota hai to bahar ke liye nahi soch sakte initial par. Customer trust build karna padta hai pehle yahan par uske baad mein bahar ke liye hum kuch soch vichar kar sakte hain. To isliye Udaipur ka target yahi hai ki Udaipur ki lead mile yahi hai target. Ye nahi hai target aisa nahi hai ki lekin ye unfortunately aisa ho raha hai is vajah se aur aur koi reason nahi hai.

Customer: Mujhe matlab apne Sir hyper local mein aap Udaipur mein deal karte hain sabse jyada?

Customer: Haan sabse jyada jaise hum log offline mein bhi karte hain to Udaipur mein hi currently deal karte hain. Udaipur ke alava koi other location mein aap deal nahi karte hain sir?

Customer: Karte hain deal aisa nahi hai par wahan ki customer build trust jaise ki aapne aapko bolu na ki Udaipur mein isliye karna chahte hain kyunki customer ko at least yahan par bula kar ke apna product dikha kar ke convince kiya ja sakta hai product ko lekar ke apne ya buying ke liye uski har cheez usko samjha sakte hain isko lekar ke. Lekin agar koi bahar ka customer hai usko aasani se convince nahi kar sakte jab tak usko product nahi dikhayenge kyunki ek hota hai na ki ye e-commerce platform nahi hai. E-commerce platform pe to samne dikhta hai wo sab mangwate hain Amazon se Flipkart se wo sab thik hai par ye e-commerce ek tarike se nahi hai to customer ko ek rehta hai na ki apne trust build bhi ek ek to purana business ho brand name ho pehle se to hota hai na to hamara abhi naya kaam hai brand name bhi nahi hai isliye hum bahar ke customer ko humne try kiya hai sir aisa nahi hai ki bahar ke leads vagera nahi liye. Jodhpur, Jaipur, Ahmedabad in sabhi customers se baat karne ki koshish kar li lekin unka concern sirf yahi hai ki wo ek baar product dekhna chahte hain. Kyunki ye e-commerce platform nahi hai isliye product dekhna chahte hain to hamara target ye tha ki Udaipur ke customers jo ki aasani se hum yahan par unko bula sakte hain near by unke location par ye jyada door nahi hota unse within the city hai. To ye is ye particular reason ki vajah se Udaipur customer targeted hamara ye plan tha lene ka jo motive tha. Hmm hmm. To wo lead milni thi aur even sales team se baat bhi isi base par hui thi ki Udaipur ki leads humko milegi tabhi hum continue karenge otherwise nahi karenge. Unhone bola tha bilkul aapko Udaipur ki leads milegi jo ki abhi tak bilkul zero hai. Hmm hmm.

Executive: To sales team wale bhi sir ye bole the kya ki matlab ki agar Udaipur ke leads milegi tabhi aap services ka istemal karenge varna aap jo hai cancel kar sakte hain?

Customer: Bilkul bilkul 100% unse baat hui thi unhone kaha tha ki Udaipur ki leads aapko milegi. Mera unse baat hi yahi hui thi there is not any written agreement. Kuch bhi aisa nahi hai ki unhone likh kar ke kuch diya ho ya maine kuch likh kar ke manga unse aisa kuch nahi hai lekin unse baat jab wo yahan par mujhse deal kar rahe the iske bare mein IndiaMART ke plan ke bare mein to unko maine seedha seedha straight forward ye bola tha ki agar Udaipur ki lead milegi to hi main aur maine unse data lene ki koshish bhi kari thi ki mujhe bataye ki Udaipur mein requirement hai ya nahi hai. Sales team ne mujhe data nahi bataya aur bola ki aap yahan par karo mattress ki requirement aayegi 100% aayegi hum baithe hain na 100% aayegi aisa unhone bola tha literally ye wording thi unki sales team ke. To abhi Udaipur ki requirement ke basis par hi maine liya tha aur unse clear maine ye bola tha ki agar Udaipur ki requirement ya Udaipur ki leads rahegi to hi main continue karunga isme otherwise main continue nahi karunga. Thik hai. To it's been almost aur abhi tak jaise jaise ki basically aapki services ka sir lagbhag agar main check kar pa raha hun to abhi recently jo hai one month cross kiya hai do din pehle sir. Do se teen din pehle thik hai. To main request karunga sir aapse ki services ka kuch din aur istemal kariye thik hai aur services ko jo hai main kuch changes isme karke aapko de deta hun. To usme thoda sa aur istemal kariye to aapko kahin na kahin iska benefit milega sir. To agar aap kehte hain sir to hum isme kuch keywords aur category add kar dete hain so so that aapko ek baar check out kar lete hain ki kya naam hai ki kya major issues hain hum usko solution aapko provide kar denge. Kai aap bhi kahin na kahin sir purchase kiye honge to business lene ke hi purpose se purchase kiye honge na ki business bana band karne ke purpose se sir. Thik hai to agar sir hume ek mauka de aap sir to hum kahin na kahin isme add on karke thoda sa category aur keyword changes karke aapko benefit de sakte hain sir isme.

Customer: To agar iska kuch benefit hota hai to obviously main main mera bhi mujhe bhi aisa nahi hai ki IndiaMART pe kuch aisa discontinue karna mera target hai aisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Mujhe bhi chahiye par mera jab business hi nahi raha hai to main kyun continue karu is ye reason tha agar aisa kuch hai agar aap bolte hain ki kuch keywords jaise agar kuch din aur ruk kar ke dekhne se to obviously thik hai thik hai koi dikkat nahi dekh lenge par agar fir bhi kuch nahi milta hai to mujhe aap fir isse discontinue karna hi padega IndiaMART se.

Executive: Thik hai sir to ek baar request karunga to koi time bata sakte hain sir jis time hum aapke sath ek chhoti si meeting conduct kar paye?

Customer: Aah

Customer: Evening mein kar sakte hain.

Executive: Evening mein kitne baje sir?

Customer: 5 5 baje tak.

Executive: 5 baje. Thik hai sir to main ek kaam kar raha hun ek chhoti si aapke sath meeting conduct kar le raha hun jisme hum kuch keywords aur category aur tamam chize aur addition karenge aur look out karenge ki sir Udaipur se leads aapko kyun kya problem hai kyun nahi aa rahi hai fir agar still aapke continue nahi rehta hai issues aate hain to we will hum dekhenge ki iske liye jo best out of best hai wo aapko resolution provide karke denge.

Customer: Haan thik hai koi dikkat nahi hai isme aisa kuch rehta hai response mil jata to better hai otherwise main fir bhi aapko dobara se mention kar raha hun ki fir bhi agar kuch response nahi rehta hai Udaipur se local Udaipur city se unfortunately mujhe isko continue karna hi padega. Thik hai sir aap jo time bata rahe hain wo best. Thik hai sir to ek baar

Executive: Thik hai sir to ek kaam karte hain 5 baje main meeting aapke sath conduct kar leta hun thik hai 5 baje hum baith ke aur iska solution aapko provide karte hain sir thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai. Koi dikkat nahi. Thik hai sir jo aapne customer care pe call kiya hai uska ek ticket raise hota hai sir. To agar aapke sath permission ho to hum ye ticket close kar de sir currently abhi ke liye?

Customer: Aah thik hai kar dijiye koi. Thik hai aapke pass ek mail jayega satisfaction ka sir wo mere ko leke hoga sir thik hai mujhe aapka account manager hun to mujhe leke hoga. To usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega so that main aapka account manager future mein bhi bana kar bana rahu. Not satisfied mark karne pe ho sakta hai Anand Vajpayee sir main. Thik hai agar ho sakta hai ki not satisfied mark karne pe mujhe as an account manager badal diya jayega. To koshish kariye ga usko satisfied hi mark kariye ga sir thik hai?

Customer: Okay okay okay it's okay. Thik hai main aapko sir mujhe kuch bhi problem nahi hai pehle bhi mere sath ye issue raha tha sir main account manager ke mujhe bahut jyada is par matlab ek proper response is cheez thi aur unhone pura solution kar ke diya tha pehle ki jo I think pata nahi jo engineering team ki taraf se kuch keywords bhi even mismatch the aur wording spelling mistakes thi sab chize Koi issue nahi sir hum isko jo hai aaj sham ko 5 baje aapke sath meeting jab conduct karenge to mostly solve karenge sir ye issue aapka thik hai?

Customer: Nahi na abhi proper hai wo aapki taraf se account manager aap hi the shayad to unki taraf se proper solution nahi nahi jaise sir keywords ho gaya category ho gaya ye sari chizon mein hum thoda aur improvement karenge so that aapko positive response usme mile thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai. Okay okay okay. Thank you. To main concern aapka band kar raha hun sir please mark kar dijiyega satisfied thik hai?

Customer: Yes sure sure sure. Thik okay.

Executive: Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads from Udaipur.

- Wants to cancel the subscription plan.

- Sales team promised Udaipur leads.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested continuing services for some time.

- Executive offered to add keywords and categories.

- Meeting scheduled to discuss the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled at 5 PM to resolve issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, cancellation, udaipur
